reviews.review: O jogo é perfeito, porem oque estraga a experiencia são os hackers, que eu tive pouco contato usando o prime, e também smurfes(pessoas com patente alta jogando em patente baixa), fora isso tem os jogadores tóxicos que são chatos e ignorantes. Tirando  esses detalhes o jogo é incrivel e eu recomendo =)
This game truly changes you if you put in the hard work and dedication to get good.ALSO GLHF
Great game but damn if your new prepare to get your ass kicked. I dunno look up some video if your interested. Also isnt it free now?
BRO      THIS    G  SAME      SUCK   S    ALL           I     DOT    IS    DIE     NAD      GET    KILLED     B  Y     CHEATERS     OMG
dont get good at this game, you will just meet cheaters.

Игра норм не быть тут читеров, а в целом играть по фану можно, а также если если хотите добиться успехов  в игре "COUNTER-STRIKE: GLOBAL OFFENSIVE" соберите отличную пати с которой почти каждый день можно расслабиться и орать как профи не замечая этого. Подложите хуй на игру. Как не странно но если ты чсв, то ты Глобалом можешь стать....

I played 2 games for the first time in 10 years, now I can't play for a day. Received this message:

"Unable to Queue: Temporary Cooldown 20 Hours 58 Mins

Congratulations on your recent competitive wins! Before you play competitive matches further please wait for matchmaking servers to calibrate your Skill Group placement based on your latest performance."
